Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Minocycline (1-32 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test System - Short Incubation
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture (Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria, Gram-positive bacteria)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System using minocycline (1-32 μg/mL) in automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing for Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and Gram-positive isolates (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) using minocycline (1-32 μg/mL) in BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System.
